channel.title: About on Matt Galloway, University of Minnesota
channel.description: Recent content in About on Matt Galloway, University of Minnesota

item.title: About
item.description: I am a PhD student at the University of Minnesota. In May 2015, I received my B.S. and B.A. from the University of St. Thomas, St. Paul. I majored in statistics, mathematics, and actuarial science and minored in renaissance. My research is currently supervised by Adam J. Rothman, Ph.D. and broadly relates to efficient precision matrix estimation. Education Ph.D. Student, School of Statistics, University of Minnesota, 2015 - Present. B.S., B.
